methods.name: doMath
methods.desc: A method that takes two numbers and does either addition or subtraction

args.name: operation
args.desc: The operation to perform. Can be either 'sum' or 'difference'

methods.name: hello
methods.desc: A demonstration method used in the AlgoKit fullstack template.Greets the user by name.

args.name: name
args.desc: The name of the user to greet.

returns.desc: A greeting message to the user.
